description:
Netflix has announced a two-hour Christmas special will be available around the globe on Dec. 23. What’s more, Season 2 will pick up with 10 new episodes on May 5. Netflix公布了将在12月23日全球上映为期两小时的《超感猎杀》的圣诞特辑。而且第二季10集将在2017年5月5日上映。

“Sense8” stars Tuppence Middleton, Brian J. Smith, Doona Bae, Aml Ameen, Max Riemelt, Tina Desai, Miguel Ángel Silvestre and Jamie Clayton as eight strangers who become mentally and emotionally linked. Lana Wachowski, Grant Hill and J. Michael Straczynski are the show’s executive producers.《超感猎杀》的主演Tuppence Middleton，Brian J. Smith，Doona Bae，Aml Ameen，Max Riemelt，Tina Desai，Miguel Ángel Silvestre 还有Jamie Clayton饰演八个陌生人在精神和情感上互相“链接感应”的故事。Lana Wachowski，Grant Hill和J. Michael Straczynski是本剧的出品人。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 豆瓣高分科幻剧《超感猎人》将出圣诞特辑
